meanings.sent1: The nonfilterable mud clogged the drain.
meanings.sent2: The nonfilterable particles were too large to pass through the sieve.
meanings.sent3: The nonfilterable coffee grounds refused to cooperate with the filter.
meanings.sent4: Her nonfilterable opinions were like a solid wall, impossible to change.
meanings.sent5: The nonfilterable fog enveloped the city, obscuring everything in its path.

meanings.definition: Unable to pass through a filter.
meanings.sent1: The nonfilterable oil created a thick layer on top of the water.
meanings.sent2: The nonfilterable impurities remained trapped in the filter paper.
meanings.sent3: The nonfilterable syrup stubbornly stayed in the jar, refusing to pour out.
meanings.sent4: His nonfilterable emotions overwhelmed him, unable to be contained.
meanings.sent5: The nonfilterable dust settled on every surface, impossible to remove with a regular filter.
